resources.string:
About the application

The application is designed to check for the presence of excess of the set speed detected by automatic means of photo and video shooting on a vehicle registered in the Republic of Belarus.

Please note that the information about the presence of the fact of exceeding the speed of traffic becomes available not from the moment of fixation of the speed of movement, but from the date of issuing the decision on imposing an administrative penalty against the owner (owner). The period of imposing an administrative penalty is two months from the day of the commission of the offense.

How to use the application

Initially, it is necessary to add one or more vehicles by entering data from the vehicle data sheet. Please note: the letters must fully correspond to those recorded in the data sheet!

If you set the auto-check flag, the check will be performed automatically several times a day, even if the application is not running. If a fine is found, a notification will be generated, by clicking on which you can go to the application, where the new fines found are highlighted in color.

To manually check penalties at once for all vehicles, click the button at the top right or swipe down the list of vehicles.

To remove a car - swipe to the left, to edit - to the right. Clicking on the car will display all previously found fines. Here you can check fines for this car only.

You can remove the penalty from the application by following it to the left. Options for paying a penalty are available after clicking on the icon to the right of the selected penalty.

Frequently Asked Questions

Question: Where can I get a copy of the order?
Answer: In accordance with part 4 of approx. Article 10.3 of the Administrative Procedural Code of the Republic of Belarus on Administrative Offenses, a copy of the decision on imposing an administrative penalty within 3 days from the date of its issuance shall be served or sent by registered mail to the person against whom it was rendered. If a copy of the decision on imposing an administrative penalty by mail was not received, a copy of the resolution is issued in the administrative practice of the territorial subdivision of the SAI solely at the place of residence of the owner (owner) of the vehicle or the driver of the legal entity.

Question: What will happen if you do not pay the fine?
Answer: In case of failure to pay a fine within one month from the date of entry into force of the decision on imposition of an administrative penalty, the body that imposed and implements the administrative penalty sends an idea about the forcible collection of a fine, a copy of the decision on imposing an administrative penalty and other documents required for execution, to the enforcement department at the place of residence of the person subjected to administrative penalty.

Question: How to appeal the decision?
Answer: In case of disagreement with bringing to administrative responsibility, a person subjected to an administrative penalty is entitled to apply to the State Traffic Inspectorate at the place of residence with the application within one month from the date of receipt of the copy of the decision, while providing evidence that in the moment of fixation of an administrative offense the vehicle was in the possession or use of another person, or by this moment has left his possession as a result of the unlawful actions of other persons.
